result.execSummary:
The defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Threats to Injure/Accuse of Crime, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.30(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in custody.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states cases and parties state appearances.  Parties rec/rev revocation summary in 13CF194.  State states recs.  Atty Middleton agrees and enters NC plea to Ct 1 in 15CF303.  DE agrees.  Court advises DE of felony firearms warnings, voting rights and questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.

13CF194
Ct 1:  Probation revoked
12 months jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence to commence forthwith
Civil judgments for any unpaid costs/surcharges, etc.
155 days credit to be applied 


15CF303
Ct 1:  NC - w/o the repeater
90 days jail w/huber consecutive to sentence in 13CF194
DNA sample to be provided
Costs/surcharges of $518.00 to be paid today or set up payment plan w/COC's office
Cash bond to be applied

Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is currently revoked and awaiting sentencing.  Request 30 day reset.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for February 19, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Middleton gives status.  Offer has been received, however defendant has revocation on another matter pending.  Request return date 30 days out.  State has no objection.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Melville Peter Middleton in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Middleton states DE is in custody.  Requests another RD.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for December 17, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial br. 3.  Bond continues.

Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 3.  Return date scheduled for December 2, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Requests Preliminary hearing; Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 23, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Attorney Melville Peter Middleton in court.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and appearances.  Atty Middleton withdraws his motion to modify the bond.  Court so grants that withdrawal.

Pre-trial conference at 09-25-2015 10:15 am.
Return date at 10-08-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cody L. Forsythe-Murdock appeared by video means with Attorney Middleton. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  State request $1000 cash bond.  Attorney Middleton request signature bond.  Currently on probation through Aug. 2016.  Defendant does qualify for PD.  Time limits waived. $500.00 CASH bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 25, 2015 at 10:15 am.  Return date scheduled for October 8, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
